LanguageData.MedicalPotency.label: 医疗效力
LanguageData.MedicalPotency.description: 这个物品用于治疗伤口和疾病，或者进行手术时的效力。越高的医疗效力越能提升治疗质量，以及作为手术成功率的乘数。手术成功率还受到外科医生和手术床的影响。
LanguageData.MedicalQualityMax.label: medical tend quality maximum
LanguageData.MedicalQualityMax.description: The maximum quality of medical tending that can be achieved while using this. Better tend quality allows skilled doctors to treat wounds better, as well as more reliably.
LanguageData.ConstructionSpeedFactor.label: construction speed
LanguageData.ConstructionSpeedFactor.description: The speed at which buildings made of this are constructed is multiplied by this value. Some materials, like stone, are slow to build from, while others, like wood, are fast.
